derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Latin minima, from minimus 'smallest'

entry.def: A minim is a musical note that has a time value equal to two crotchets or two quarter notes.

means.word_mean: 1. a British imperial capacity measure (liquid or dry) equal to 1/60th fluid dram or 0.059194 cubic centimeters
2. a United States liquid unit equal to 1/60 fluidram
3. a musical note having the time value of half a whole note

stems_affixes.word_buile: administer[[v.施行,实施;掌管,料理……的事务;给予]]男→adj.管理的,行政的
minister部长+y表名词,加在形容词或r结尾的单词后→ministry部门

stems_affixes.value_cn: 管理, 经营, 行政部门
stems_affixes.word_buile: administer[[v.施行,实施;掌管,料理……的事务;给予]]→n.管理, 经营, 行政部门
mini小+ature表名词→小物品→小画象
mini小+ster人→小人→古代大臣称呼自己"小人"→部长,大臣

stems_affixes.value_cn: 施行,实施;掌管,料理……的事务;给予
使减少到最少,使降到最低
stems_affixes.word_buile: minim[n.极小之物;半音符]+ize表动词→减少到最少
di分开+mini小+ish表动词→变小,减少
